summary: The module runs a word-error-rate benchmark for Whisper speech-to-text models. It loads a specified audio dataset, performs inference with a Faster-Whisper model, normalizes the transcriptions, computes WER using jiwer, and records the results in a JSON report while showing progress with tqdm.
business_intent: Provide an automated way to evaluate and compare the accuracy of Whisper-based speech recognition systems on custom datasets, enabling stakeholders to assess model performance and make data-driven decisions about deployment or further development.
